document_data.name: Fleer
document_data.mainbody:
'''Fleer''' was a fisherwoman from the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Lookâ€“if you fall into the harbor, I am not fishing you out.|Fleer}}
document_data.Description: Fleer was a [[human]] woman with a bronze skin tone, light brown hair and eyes. She wore a blue commoner's [[tunic]] and a workman's trousers.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, as the [[Absolute crisis]] ravaged the Gate, Fleer's fishing was damaged further by pollution of the [[Gray Harbor]]. Fishers in the Lower City kept pulling up [[net]]s filled with fish covered in black [[oil]]y goo. In reality, the [[fish]] was smothered in oil pollution left behind by a [[submersible]] used by the [[Cult of Bane]] to transport [[Lord Gortash]]'s prisoners into the drowned [[Iron Throne headquarters]] prison at the bottom of Gray Harbor.
